ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Our Guild Charter V 1.1
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah, just remembered.  Need a line in there about laughing together when things get rough. *********** REPLY SEPARATOR  *********** On 6/16/03 at Dr. Mom wrote:
ygData.messageBody:
Ah, just remembered. Need a line in there about laughing together
when things get rough.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 6/16/03 at Dr. Mom wrote:

____(No time to chat. Just had these ideas while making dinner.
Have
____a class tonight.)
____
____
____We are a sisterhood. Only women may join. If we find out that
a
____man has joined, he will be deguilded. (And trained. Just
kidding.)
____
____Anyone can "serve and protect" but not to the degree that women
are
____capable of. We vow to cover for each other when someone hears
a
____THUMP from in the playroom. We vow to tutor each others
youngsters
____in the ways of the game. When they are 18, they must seek
their
____own guilds. We vow to watch our sisters' backs when they smell
____smoke in the kitchen. We vow to be there for each other when
____someone needs to talk. We vow to never leave a comrade's body
____unrezzed or unobtainable.
____
____Finally, this is only a game. We vow not to take it so
seriously
____our egos could be threatened. Raids are not mandatory. We
will
____set buffing schedules for those who need to solo early in the
AM or
____late at night.
____
____If you breathe a sigh of relief to see these vows, apply today
at
____our guild website.<insert link>
____
____
____What did I forget?
____
____Someone see if the last name, Amazon, is available?
____Those who would give up essential liberty to purchase a little
____temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.
____ - Benjamin Franklin, motto to Historical Review of
Pennsylvania
____
____Muriel Hykes
____drmom@...
____www.geocities.com/muriel_drmom
